channel.title: Homey on Chris ter Beke
channel.description: Recent content in Homey on Chris ter Beke

item.title: Homey Remeha
item.description: The Homey Remeha Home App adds support for Remeha Home to Homey. This allows you to monitor and control your Remeha thermostat, heat pump or gas boiler.

item.title: Homey Uponor
item.description: The Homey Uponor Smatrix App adds support for Uponor Smatrix to Homey. This allows you to monitor and control your underfloor heating thermostats for every room.

item.title: Homey Enphase
item.description: The Homey Enphase App adds support for Enphase Envoy gateways to Homey. This allows you to track solar production in Homey, and create automations based on it.
